column2: This laws defines the amount of taxes extracted from the working men and women of your nation.The harsher the taxing, the more discontent the citizens.
With this law the people aren't made to pay much in taxes.
With this law the people pay a significant amount of their income to the government. They will not be pleased, but they must contribute like everyone else.
The people will be obligated to give most of their earnings in taxes to the government.
With this law the people will owe almost all of their earnings to the state. What do they even need money for anyway?
